widget.name: Unsaved Changes Message
widget.description: Mendix widget to block the user from closing the browser, closing the tab, or clicking a Mendix navigation when they have unsaved changes

property.caption: Observe
property.description: What types of navigation should the widget prevent?

property.caption: Block Exit?
property.description: Boolean expression that determines whether or not to show the message.

property.caption: Show choice popup?
property.description: If true, popup will get shown: Proceed or Cancel? If false, no popup will be shown. Action OnProcess will immediately get executed.

property.caption: In-App Block Type
property.description: How should in-app navigation be blocked? Class Names - easier to setup, but do NOT get triggered with keyboard controls. JavaScript Action - more effort, but does get triggered with keyboard controls. NOTE: All potential navigations away from the page MUST call the JavaScript Action

property.caption: Watching Class List
property.description: Comma separated list of JavaScript Selectors used to find actions to prevent.

property.caption: Nav Menu Class List
property.description: Comma separated list of nav menu JavaScript Selectors to block. The widget will look for 'li a' elements inside these Selectors and block them. NOTE: if the widget is in a popup, set this to empty

property.caption: Body Text
property.description: The main text content. ONLY affects Mendix navigations.

translations.translation: You have unsaved changes, are you sure you want to leave?

property.caption: Proceed Caption
property.description: The text for the confirm button. ONLY affects Mendix navigations.

property.caption: Cancel Caption
property.description: The text for the cancel button. ONLY affects Mendix navigations.

property.caption: On Proceed
property.description: MxAction fired when the user clicks on the Proceed button.

property.caption: On Cancel
property.description: MxAction fired when the user clicks on the Cancel button.

property.caption: On Change Block
property.description: MxAction fired when the result of the Block Exit expression changes.
